thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Doha Bank OGM Approves EMTN Bonds Issue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Doha Bank OGM Approves EMTN Bonds Issue
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - DOHA BANK:
* OGM APPROVES ISSUANCE OF DEBT NOTES “BONDS” USING DOHA BANK EMTN PROGRAMME‍​
* SAYS BONDS ISSUE TO BE IN VARYING AMOUNTS WHICH WOULD, IN AGGREGATE, NOT EXCEED THE EMTN PROGRAMME VALUING $2 BILLION
* SAYS NO SINGLE DEAL OF BONDS ISSUE WOULD EXCEED $1 BILLION
* SAYS BONDS ISSUE WOULD BE IN VARIOUS CURRENCIES INCLUDING US DOLLAR, EURO, TAIWAN DOLLAR, AUSTRALIAN DOLLAR, YEN, SWISS FRANCS, STERLING POUND
* BONDS’ VARYING MATURITIES NOT TO EXCEED 30 YEARS * OGM APPROVES REDUCTION OF MINIMUM AMOUNT PER ISSUANCE TO $1 MILLION FROM $50 MILLION UNDER COMMERCIAL PAPERS PROGRAM Source:( bit.ly/2G4aM2U ) Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
